/opt/nci/bin/c++  -g   -fpic -Wall -Wextra -Wno-deprecated-declarations -Wpedantic -O2 -g -DNDEBUG CMakeFiles/opengl_main.dir/opengl_main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/opengl_main.dir/cloth_code.cpp.o -o opengl_main  -lm /usr/lib64/libOpenGL.so /usr/lib64/libGLX.so /usr/lib64/libGLU.so /usr/lib64/libglut.so /usr/lib64/libXmu.so /usr/lib64/libXi.so /half-root/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-redhat-linux/8/libgomp.so /half-root/usr/lib64/libpthread.so
